meanings.definition: A plant with a thick edible root
meanings.sent1: I planted some beets in my garden last spring.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested the beets for the market.
meanings.sent3: The beets in the garden were having a lively conversation.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks turned as red as beets when she was embarrassed.
meanings.sent5: The beets in the soil were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: The edible root of the beet plant
meanings.sent1: She boiled the beets for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The chef used fresh beets in the salad.
meanings.sent3: The beets rolled off the plate and onto the floor, causing a mess.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as deep as the color of beets.
meanings.sent5: The earthy aroma of the beets filled the kitchen as she cooked them.

meanings.sent1: The sunset painted the sky with shades of beets.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful dress in the color of beets.
meanings.sent3: The beets of the traffic light signaled us to stop.
meanings.sent4: His face turned beet red when he realized his mistake.
meanings.sent5: The room was bathed in a warm, beet-colored glow from the lamp.
